How CampusMarket Works

Buy and sell within your campus in just three simple steps.

Discover Items on Campus

Browse listings posted by students around your campus. Find books, gadgets, fashion, and more â€” all within walking distance.

Chat & Agree

Connect directly with the seller through in-app messaging. Ask questions, negotiate, and agree on meetup details.

Meet & Trade Safely

Meet within campus to inspect items and complete your transaction safely â€” no delivery stress, no hidden fees.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about how CampusMarket works.

CampusMarket is a dedicated platform for students to buy, sell, and trade items and services within their university community. We make campus commerce safer, faster, and more social.
Yes! CampusMarket is designed to be hyper-local. When you sign up, you'll be connected with other students on your specific campus, making meetups and trades as convenient as possible.
We use university email verification and a community rating system to ensure you're trading with real students. We also recommend meeting in well-lit, public campus areas for all transactions.
Currently, we facilitate the connection and communication. Payments and delivery are handled directly between the buyer and seller during their meetup. This keeps the platform free and simple.
Absolutely! Listing items and browsing on CampusMarket is completely free for all verified students. Our goal is to support the student community.
